title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 670.5 - Long-term inpatient rehabilitation programs for head-injured patients
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 670.5 - Long-term inpatient rehabilitation programs for head-injured patients

State Regulations

The factors and methodology to be considered by the Public

Health Council for determining the public need for long-term inpatient
rehabilitation program beds and services for head-injured patients shall
include, but not be limited to, the substantive criteria and methodology set
forth in section
709.11
of this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
670.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
